'''"Peaceful Residence in the Musicmaking Town"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Peaceful Residence in the Musicmaking Town" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in {{Location|Petrichor}}.

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Petrichor}}.
